params.amount: The base amount to calculate fee from

params.universalProfile_: Address of the Universal Profile contract

returns.platformFeeBasisPoints: The platform fee in basis points

returns.sellerProceeds: The amount going to the seller (totalAmount - platformFee)

params.recipient: The address to receive the proceeds

calculateFee(uint256).notice: Calculates the platform fee for a given amount

constructor.notice: Constructor sets the Universal Profile address

getPlatformFeeConfig().notice: Gets the current platform fee configuration

getPlatformProceeds(address).notice: Gets accumulated platform fees for a payment token

getPlatformProceedsBeneficiary().notice: Gets the authorized platform proceeds beneficiary address

splitPayment(uint256).notice: Splits a payment amount into platform fee and seller proceeds

withdrawProceeds(address,address).notice: Withdraws accumulated platform proceeds (only callable by beneficiary via LSP17)
